meanings.definition: An animal that naturally preys on others.
meanings.sent1: Lions and tigers are predators in the wild.
meanings.sent2: The predators silently stalked their prey in the dark forest.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky predators played hide and seek with the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The predators of the ocean lurked in the shadows, ready to strike.
meanings.sent5: The hungry predators pounced on the unsuspecting herd.

meanings.definition: A person or group that ruthlessly exploits others.
meanings.sent1: Some greedy predators take advantage of the vulnerable.
meanings.sent2: The corporate predators exploited their employees for profit.
meanings.sent3: The cunning predators tricked others into doing their work for them.
meanings.sent4: The predators of society preyed on the innocence of the youth.
meanings.sent5: The heartless predators manipulated their way to the top.
